column5: Good news if your lodge has it's rates set in Canadian $........you just saved 10% (approx.) http://business.financialpost.com/20...elow-90%C2%A2/...........and if this guy is right ( http://business.financialpost.com/20...another-10-15/ ) a 25 % discount may be in your future.
That will be good for trade. May slow down trips south of the border though. Overall a good thing in my opinion.
Its about time.hope it drops more.that will be good for us poor guides.
The lodge I go to deals in US dollars but if it goes to 25% I'm going to have to find one that does business in Canadian dollars and take an extra trip.

Hey, just keep the dollars par and shut the door! This cold you are sending us is killing me on my heat bill. I'd rather fatten some Canadians wallets than our propane companies here.PS Could you come get Justin Beiber and bring him home!
But we get to keep Shania Twain.
It'll be nice even for us lodges that charge in US funds. We can either keep the prices the same, or (gasp) actually lower prices!
I actually heard that gasp, Jared
